text: And the tsitsits had a message sealed inside the knots just as there is a message sealed in the four emblems which are used on Passover, to depict the "time of our freedom. And they are 1) Matzo; 2) Bitter Herbs; 3) Salt-water and Charas a kind of fruit mixture in likeness of the appearance of mortar); and (4) an attitude to lean back.
handwritten_text: And the tsitsits had a message sealed inside the knots just as there is a message sealed in the four emblems which are used on Passover, to depict the "time of our freedom. And they are 1) Matzo; 2) Bitter Herbs; 3) Salt-water and Charas a kind of fruit mixture in likeness of the appearance of mortar); and (4) an attitude to lean back.
